resources.string: Deezer song search API \nBy: Yashan Wasson
No result found, please try another word.

"1, Under "New Search" tab, please enter a word to start translating. If no result shown, Please enter a new word.

2, You can press SAVE button to save a term to your own vocabulary for future review.

3, You can manage your vocabulary under Saved-Vocabulary tab, and delete any term or all terms you donnot need anymore.
 "
Do you want to delete this term:
Are you sure you want to empty the vocabulary?
The whole vocabulary is now empty.
Are you sure you want to delete this location?

Instructions for using the interface:

 1. Enter the latitude and longitude of the desired location.

 2. Click the Search button to retrieve the sunrise and sunset times.

 3. Click the Add button to save the location to your favourites.

 4. Use the menu options to navigate between screens.
Do you want to exit the APP and return to the main API entrance?

Instructions for using the interface:

 1. Enter the name of the recipe you would like to search.

 2. Click the Search button to see possible result.

 3. Click the save button to save the recipe.

 4. Use the menu options to navigate between screens.

This is the help information for the Song Details activity.
